transcript: I mean, it's just this. I mean, it includes a lot and everything and you know, it's the sand and it's the full moon and I just... I'm sorry, but I couldn't help wishing I were somewhere else.

I'm sorry, but I couldn't help wishing I were somewhere else.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I mean it is just this , I mean it includes a lot and everything and you know it's the sand and it's the full moon and I just-I am sorry but I couldn't help wishing I was somewhere else.
